_pageTitle.comment: Page title displayed in the browser tab
_clientsTitle.comment: List header title for the list of clients

columns.name: Name
columns._name.comment: Name column header label of the list
columns._requests.comment: Requests column header label of the list
columns._tags.comment: Tags column header label of the list

rowActions._edit.comment: Row action button text for editing a client

fields._middleNamePlaceholder.comment: Placeholder for Middle name optional field
fields._dateOfBirthPlaceholder.comment: Placeholder for Date of Birth field
fields._zipCodePlaceholder.comment: Placeholder for zip code address field

yup._tooShort.comment: Validation label for too short value
yup._tooLong.comment: Validation label for too long value

submitMessage.failed: Submit Failed: Please review and update fields or edit the existing account.

fields._middleNamePlaceholder.comment: Placeholder for Middle name optional field
fields._dateOfBirthPlaceholder.comment: Placeholder for Date of Birth field
fields._zipCodePlaceholder.comment: Placeholder for zip code address field

yup._tooShort.comment: Validation label for too short value
yup._tooLong.comment: Validation label for too long value

submitMessage.failed: Submit Failed: Please review and update fields or edit the existing account.

body.noRequests: No requests available for this contact.
body._noRequests.comment: No request text for contacts with no requests

demographics._notProvided.comment: Label used when a contact has chosen to not provide any demographic field

gender.label: Gender
gender._label.comment: Label radio select input for a user to specify the gender of a client
gender._customOptionPlaceholder.comment: Placeholder for user to input the client's gender if not listed

options._female.comment: Indicates that the client identifies as female
options._male.comment: Indicates that the client identifies as male
options._other.comment: Indicates that the client identifies as something other than female or male

ethnicity.label: Ethnicity
ethnicity._label.comment: Label radio select input for a user to specify the ethnicity of a client
ethnicity._customOptionPlaceholder.comment: Placeholder for user to input the client's ethnicity if not listed

options._hispanic.comment: Indicates that the client identifies as Hispanic
options._not-hispanic-or-latino.comment: Indicates that the client identifies as not Hispanic or Latino
options._other.comment: Indicates that the client identifies as something other Hispanic or not Hipsanic

race.label: Race
race._label.comment: Label radio select input for a user to specify the race of a client
race._customOptionPlaceholder.comment: Placeholder for user to input the client's race if not listed

options._american-indian-alaska-native.comment: Indicates that the client identifies as American Indian or Alaska Native
options._asian.comment: Indicates that the client identifies as Asian
options._black-aa.comment: Indicates that the client identifies as Black or African American
options._native-hawaiian-pacific-islander.commen: Indicates that the client identifies as something Native Hawaiian or Pacific Islander
options._white.comment: Indicates that the client identifies as White
options._other.comment: Indicates that the client identifies as something other than female or male

preferredContactMethod.label: Preferred Contact Method
preferredContactMethod._label.comment: Label radio select input for a user to specify the preferred contact method of a client

options._phone.comment: Indicates that the client prefers to be contacted via phone
options._email.comment: Indicates that the client prefers to be contacted via email
options._at-home-visit.comment: Indicates that the client prefers to be contacted via at home visit
options._mail.comment: Indicates that the client prefers to be contacted via mail

preferredLanguage.label: Preferred Language
preferredLanguage._label.comment: Label radio select input for a user to specify the preferred language of a client
preferredLanguage._customOptionPlaceholder.comment: Placeholder for user to input the client's preferred language if not listed

options._english.comment: Indicates that the client prefers to be contacted in English
options._spanish.comment: Indicates that the client prefers to be contacted in Spanish
options._other.comment: Indicates that the client prefers to be contacted in a language other than english or Spanish

preferredContactTime.label: Preferred Contact Time
preferredContactTime._label.comment: Label radio select input for a user to specify the preferred contact time of a client

options._morning.comment: Indicates that the client prefers to be contacted in the morning
options._day.comment: Indicates that the client prefers to be contacted in the day
options._evening.comment: Indicates that the client prefers to be contacted in the evening
